pullrequest.title: Feature System Part 6: Features for constructing objects from SDF data

content.raw:
> I'm not sure if you've synced with [@Nathan Koenig](https://bitbucket.org/nkoenig) on this, but my understanding was that the gz11 beta would use `ign-gazebo`'s ECS and `ign-physics`.

Ah, no, I hadn't heard about the ECS development in `ign-gazebo`, so I didn’t know that had been progressing. Thanks for pointing that out!

I'll subscribe to `ign-gazebo` notifications; hopefully that’ll help me stay in the loop.
content.html:
I'm not sure if you've synced with @Nathan Koenig on this, but my understanding was that the gz11 beta would use ign-gazebo's ECS and ign-physics.

Ah, no, I hadn't heard about the ECS development in ign-gazebo, so I didn’t know that had been progressing. Thanks for pointing that out!

I'll subscribe to ign-gazebo notifications; hopefully that’ll help me stay in the loop.
